report.title: UKBMS sites list
report.query: SELECT l.id, l.name, COUNT(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences, COUNT(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) AS taxa FROM report_websites w JOIN surveys su on su.website_id=w.id JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.website_id=w.id JOIN locations l ON l.id=lw.location_id LEFT JOIN (samples s JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted='f' JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id ) on s.survey_id=su.id WHERE #website_filter# GROUP BY l.id, l.name #order_by#

param.name: own_sites
param.description: Filter the site list to your sites only?

param.name: own_region
param.description: Filter the site list to your region only?
